description:
The norrøna tech T-shirt is a clean and classic technical T-shirt offering
excellent breathability and moisture-wicking properties.

It's lightweight, very comfortable, and made in 100% recycled polyester with a cotton-like
touch. The functional fabric is highly breathable and efficiently pulls sweat from the skin,
spreading the moisture over a large surface area so it can dry quickly during high-intensity
activity. It's a given winner on warm days, whether you're getting your adrenaline pumping or
just heading to the beach. The shirt has a regular fit and UPF factor 50.
name: Norrona Norrona Tech T-Shirt - Mens
